item.name: users

request.description:
Register a new user with email and password.

**Request Body**
- email (string, required): The user's email address.
- password (string, required): The user's password.

**Response**
- Status: 201 Created
- Content-Type: application/json
- user_id (string): The unique identifier for the created user.
- email (string): The registered email.

Log in with user credentials and get an access token.

**Request Body**
- email (string, required): The user's email address.
- password (string, required): The user's password.

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- access_token (string): JWT token to use for authenticated requests.
- token_type (string): Type of token (e.g., "bearer").

Get the current authenticated user's profile information.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- user_id (string): The unique identifier for the user.
- email (string): The user's email address.

item.name: notes

request.description:
Create a new note for the authenticated user.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Request Body**
- title (string, required): The title of the note.
- content (string, required): The content of the note in markdown format.

**Response**
- Status: 201 Created
- Content-Type: application/json
- id (string): The unique identifier of the note.
- title (string): The title of the note.
- content (string): The content of the note.
- user_id (string): The ID of the owner.
- created_at (string): The timestamp when the note was created.
- updated_at (string): The timestamp of the last update.

Get all notes for the authenticated user.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- Array of note objects, each containing:
  - id (string): The unique identifier of the note.
  - title (string): The title of the note.
  - content (string): The content of the note.
  - user_id (string): The ID of the owner.
  - created_at (string): The timestamp when the note was created.
  - updated_at (string): The timestamp of the last update.

Get a specific note by ID. Only accessible if the note belongs to the authenticated user.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Path Parameters**
- note_id (string): The unique identifier of the note.

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- id (string): The unique identifier of the note.
- title (string): The title of the note.
- content (string): The content of the note.
- user_id (string): The ID of the owner.
- created_at (string): The timestamp when the note was created.
- updated_at (string): The timestamp of the last update.

Check the grammar of a text without saving it as a note.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Request Body**
- content (string, required): The text to check for grammar errors.

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- errors (array): List of grammar errors found in the text.

Check the grammar of a specific note. Only accessible if the note belongs to the authenticated user.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Path Parameters**
- note_id (string): The unique identifier of the note.

**Request Body**
- content (string, required): The text to check for grammar errors.

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- errors (array): List of grammar errors found in the text.

Delete a specific note. Only accessible if the note belongs to the authenticated user.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Path Parameters**
- note_id (string): The unique identifier of the note.

**Response**
- Status: 204 No Content

Update a specific note. Only accessible if the note belongs to the authenticated user.

**Headers**
- Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}

**Path Parameters**
- note_id (string): The unique identifier of the note.

**Request Body**
- title (string, required): The updated title of the note.
- content (string, required): The updated content of the note.

**Response**
- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
- The updated note object.
